mil5.1.4:5.2: aṭṭhime, bhikkhave → aṭṭha kho ime ānanda (7D.171/1) | aṭṭhime ānanda (17A8.70/1)
mil5.1.4:15.2: dhammasīsakassa → dhammāsīsakassa (mr), dānanissandabalava → dānanissandabala (bj, pts1) | dānabala (maku), chinnapattapādapā → sīnapattapādapā (bj) | nisinnapattā (maku) | sīnapattāpādapā (pts1), bubbuḷā → bubbulā (bj, maku) | pubbuḷā (mr)
mil5.1.4:17.2: bhinno parāpavādakumbho → bhinnā parappavādakumbhā (bj, pts1) | gumbo tayā viddhaṃsito (maku), nibbāhanaṃ → nibbāyanaṃ (mr)
